titles.title: Launch Out Into The Deep (takes work)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Launch out --- into the deep (Oh Launch out) (in the deep) Oh let the shoreline go Launch out - Launch out - in the ocean divine Out where the full tides flow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The mercy of God is an ocean divine A boundless and fathomless flood Launch out in the deep Cut away the shoreline And be lost in the fullness of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But many alas Only stand on the shore And gaze on the ocean so wide They never have ventured Its depths to explore Or to launch on the fathomless tide{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And others just venture away from the land And linger so near to the shore That the surf and the slime That beat o'er the strand Dash o'er them in floods evermore{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh let us launch out on this ocean so broad Where the floods of salvation e'er flow Oh let us be lost in the mercy of God Till the depths of His fullness we know{/lang-eng}
